inclusion.criterion: female patients, aged 18 years and less than 80 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: surgical resection of the primary tumor pathological examination, showed HER2 positive
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: the subjects in pregnancy or lactation
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: received chemotherapy, endocrine or anti HER2 anti-tumor therapy
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 12 year old girl with Turner syndrome and obesity. She has been treating with GH for 6 months.
